overview_of_class: This course will explore styles, structures, narrative choices, and points of view of travel writing. Students will consider the role of the traveler in narrative texts. The class will compose several travel narratives in this course as well as completing other short assignments, while improving their descriptive and narrative techniques in the process. Course readings will include travel tales written by curious tourists, explorers, and survivors.
